mapper.sql: h_id, symbol, date, open, high, low, clos, adj_close, volume
mapper.insert: insert into stock_history (h_id, symbol, date, open, high, low, clos, adj_close, volume) values (#{hId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{open,jdbcType=REAL}, #{high,jdbcType=REAL}, #{low,jdbcType=REAL}, #{clos,jdbcType=REAL}, #{adjClose,jdbcType=REAL}, #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER})

h_id,
symbol,

low,
clos,
adj_close,
volume,

mapper.update:
update stock_history
symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE},
open = #{open,jdbcType=REAL},
high = #{high,jdbcType=REAL},
low = #{low,jdbcType=REAL},
clos = #{clos,jdbcType=REAL},
adj_close = #{adjClose,jdbcType=REAL},
volume = #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where h_id = #{hId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update stock_history set symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, open = #{open,jdbcType=REAL}, high = #{high,jdbcType=REAL}, low = #{low,jdbcType=REAL}, clos = #{clos,jdbcType=REAL}, adj_close = #{adjClose,jdbcType=REAL}, volume = #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER} where h_id = #{hId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
